roleset.name: cause to be sleepy, physically spent

example.name: both args
example.text: They traveled all day, and the speed and jolting motion of the train greatly tired Him, so His attendants begged Him to stop and rest...
example.arg: the speed and jolting motion of the train

roleset.note: Frames file for 'tire' based on sentences in wsj. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, other_cos-45.4.

example.name: adjectival usage
example.text: I was tired from working all day, and didn't want to cook dinner.

roleset.name: cause to not want to put up with anymore

role.descr: what arg0 doesn't want to put up with anymore

example.name: adjectival rel: tired
example.text: Industry groups and reputable planners who are members of them want comprehensive standards, too; they're tired of seeing practitioners depicted collectively in the business press as dumber than chimpanzees and greedier than a herd of swine.
example.arg: of seeing practitioners depicted collectively in the business press as dumber than chimpanzees and greedier than a herd of swine

example.name: verbal prepositional
example.text: Mary quickly tired of John's immature antics.

roleset.name: (make) become weary, phrasal

example.name: actually verbal
example.text: Mary tired John out so he would go to sleep quicker.
example.arg: so he would go to sleep quicker

roleset.note: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, other_cos-45.4. (Membership not for VPC, just V).
